actions.description: The giff makes two Longsword or Musket attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Musket

actions.description: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the grenade, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more grenades to throw.
actions.name: Force Grenade

specialTraits.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.
specialTraits.name: Firearms Knowledge

specialTraits.description: On the deck of a ship, the giff has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone or shove it overboard.
specialTraits.name: Steady as She Goes
